name: Quick Fish Release
summary: Your inventory won't close anymore after releasing a fish, allowing you to release multiple fishes faster.
author: Syzzle
description:
After playing around with fishing in the expedition I realized how painful it was to release multiple fishes with the inventory closing everytime you released one, so I made this mod for myself to use and uploading it for anyone else that also is annoyed by it, the mod basically makes it not close the inventory when you release a fish.

Before uploading I looked around and found that someone had already done this mod before, it was [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/brehny/mods]brehny[/url]﻿, but their mod was outdated and still using the old method with PAKs that the game doesn't use anymore, after contacting them, they said they were out of the NMS loop and that I was allowed to upload my mod.
[size=2]They also made their own mod hidden hence why I can't link it here as credit for making it first.[/size][size=1]
[/size]
[b][size=5][url=https://antifandom.com/nomanssky/wiki/Mods#Installing_Mods][color=#ffff00]Click Here for Instructions of how to Install Mods[/color][/url][/size][/b]

name: Better Base Sites
summary: Causes better base sites to be discoverable via the Secure Site planetary charts.  These will be large flat areas with a base computer in the center.
author: Bladehawke
description:
There once was a mod called Easy Base Building.  The author made it for 2.12, updated it for 2.13 and then disappeared.  He does not respond to PM's and you can't even post on his mod.  His mod has been broken since 2.14.  I made a new version of the mod using [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/nomanssky/mods/957]AMUMSS[/url]﻿ and Lua. If XenonSurf ever resurfaces and objects to this mod, I'll remove it. I'll eventually post a Lua again, but at present, I'm hand editing the EXML from diffs I make from my NMSMB builds.

Now that that's out of the way, this is Better Base Sites.  If you buy/trade for a Planetary Chart for a Secure Site of Interest (the top option in trading with the Cartographer), it now has a chance of locating a Habitable (or Planetary) Base.  This base site is a large flat area with a base computer installed in the center.  Just walk up to it and claim the site.  The mod also adds a waypoint to the site.

✅ Updated for Worlds Part II
✅ Patch mod - likely to work well with other Patch and Overwrite mods

Contains the following files: 
[code]\METADATA\REALITY\TABLES\REWARDTABLE.EXML
\METADATA\SIMULATION\ENVIRONMENT\PLANETBUILDINGTABLE.EXML
\METADATA\SIMULATION\SCANNING\SCANEVENTTABLEPLANET.EXML
[/code]
warningMessage: This mod is known to conflict with XYZ. Use with caution.

name: sProtect - No Tech Damage with Shield Up
summary: Disables Tech Damage while your Shield still up, your Techs will only be damaged if your shield goes down.
author: Syzzle
description:
If you like the idea of your Techs being damage in Combat, but dislike the idea that for some reason they still get Damaged even though your Shield is there and your Ship didn't take any damage at all, this mod is for you. Your Techs will only be breaking when your Shield goes down, so until that happen your Techs will be completely protected.

[b][size=5][url=https://antifandom.com/nomanssky/wiki/Mods#Installing_Mods][color=#ffff00]Click Here for Instructions of how to Install Mods[/color][/url][/size][/b]

name: Pirate Station Corvette Teleport
summary: Add the Corvette teleport pads to the Outlaw Stations.
author: Syzzle
description:
This mod add the Corvette teleport pads to the Outlaw Stations, no need to run all the way to the Corvette everytime anymore.

[quote]⚠️ Replacement mod - Unlikely to work well with other Replacement mods[/quote]

[quote][size=5][b]Installing Mods[/b][/size]
Follow these steps to install mods.

[list=1]
[*]Browse to [b]No Man's Sky\GAMEDATA[/b].
[*]Create a folder named [b]MODS[/b].
[*]Place the [b]mod folder containing the loose files into the MODS folder[/b] (they have to be in the MODS folder itself and not in any subfolder, and no loose files should inside the MODS folder).
[*]Start the game and wait for the splash screen to disappear.
[*]If done correctly [b]the[/b] [b]game will display a[/b] [b]warning[/b] just before displaying the selection of saved games.
[/list][/quote]The warning will look like [url=https://i.imgur.com/zTEEFwI.jpeg]this[/url].

name: Better Abandoned Station
summary: The mod add the Starship Fabricator and the Corvette teleport pads to Abandoned Stations.
author: Syzzle
description:
This mod add the Starship Fabricator and the Corvette teleport pads to Abandoned Stations, which also include all the Stations in the Abandoned Mode.

[quote]⚠️ Replacement mod - Unlikely to work well with other Replacement mods[/quote]

[quote][size=5][b]Installing Mods[/b][/size]
Follow these steps to install mods.

[list=1]
[*]Browse to [b]No Man's Sky\GAMEDATA[/b].
[*]Create a folder named [b]MODS[/b].
[*]Place the [b]mod folder containing the loose files into the MODS folder[/b] (they have to be in the MODS folder itself and not in any subfolder, and no loose files should be inside the MODS folder).
[*]Start the game and wait for the splash screen to disappear.
[*]If done correctly [b]the[/b] [b]game will display a[/b] [b]warning[/b] just before displaying the selection of saved games.
[/list][/quote]The warning will look like [url=https://i.imgur.com/zTEEFwI.jpeg]this[/url].
warningMessage: This mod uses MBIN files, might conflict with other mods changing the same MBIN file.

name: sHealthcare - Health Station Life Support
summary: Makes the Health Station recover both your HP and your Life Support meter.
author: Syzzle
description:
I always found weird that you can recover your Hazard Shield and your HP on your base but for whatever reason you can't just plug your Oxygen Tank somewhere and recover your Life Support, so now you can, the Health Station will recover both your HP and your Life Support meter when used.

[b][size=5][url=https://antifandom.com/nomanssky/wiki/Mods#Installing_Mods][color=#ffff00]Click Here for Instructions of how to Install Mods[/color][/url][/size][/b]
